org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas

Class SimpleJCublas

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.jcublas.SimpleJCublas

  • public class SimpleJCublas
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple abstraction for jcublas operations

      • nrm2

        public static double nrm2(IComplexNDArray A)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Calculate the 2 norm of the ndarray. Note that this is a standin for no complex ndarray. It will treat this as a normal ndarray with a stride of 2.
        Parameters:
        A - the ndarray to calculate the norm2 of
        Returns:
        the ndarray to calculate the norm2 of
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
